title: Cybersecurity at CyberX
extract: Known and zero-day threats — CyberX detects both for complete cybersecurity. Passive and non-intrusive — with zero impact on OT networks and devices. The CyberX appliance connects to a SPAN port or network TAP and immediately begins collecting ICS network traffic via passive (agentless) monitoring.
extract_html: Known and zero-day threats — CyberX detects both for complete cybersecurity. Passive and non-intrusive — with zero impact on OT networks and devices. The CyberX appliance connects to a SPAN port or network TAP and immediately begins collecting ICS network traffic via passive (agentless) monitoring.
